Package com.github.yellowstonegames.glyph

package com.github.yellowstonegames.glyph
  • Related Packages

    Description
    com.github.yellowstonegames.glyph.rexpaint
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GlyphActor
    A simple Actor that carries with it just one long of glyph info and a Font to show that glyph with.
    GlyphGrid
    Stores a sparse map of (unmoving) glyphs by their positions, as a dense grid of background colors, and potentially Actors that can move around and perform Actions.
    GridAction
     
    GridAction.CloudAction
     
    GridAction.ExplosionAction
     
    GridAction.GibberishAction
     
    GridAction.PulseAction
     
    MoreActions
    Supplemental Action classes and methods to augment Actions.
    MoreActions.BiasGain
    A wrapper around MathTools.barronSpline(float, float, float) to use it as an Interpolation.
    MoreActions.LenientParallelAction
    Just like ParallelAction, but if given null Action items, it ignores them.
    MoreActions.LenientSequenceAction
    Executes a number of actions one at a time.
